item.title: Use Django for pagination
item.description: Create Pageinator class FantasyPagination(PageNumberPagination): page_size = 5 page_size_query_param = 'page_size' page_query_param = 'page' max_page_size = 10 Use records = FantasyRecord.objects.all().order_by("-data") paginator = FantasyPagination() page = paginator.paginate_queryset(records, request) serializer = FantasyRecordSerializer(page, many=True)
